name: Welcome Home (MalomStudios)
description:
It is said that the house where you have entered is cursed. You will have to investigate the house step by step to find out the secret.
While you investigate the house you will find some unidentified beings that will give you scares, you will have to agunate it until you discover the secret.
Controls
W- WalkA- LeftE- Pick ObjetsS- Go backD- rightQ- Examine
attention: This is a game that is still in development phase. If you find any bug, contact us and we will solve it. Also the story may not be finished.

a game created solely by malomstudios and with the help of an asset
